column3: hom ntsie hom awofo wɔ Ewuradze mu: na iyi na ɔtsen."

column2: "Dzi w’egya nye wo na nyi (ɔno nye mbra a odzi kan a anohoba ka ho)
column5: na wo nda awar wɔ asaase do."

column3: mma hom nnhyɛ hom mba ebufuw; mbom hom ntsetse hɔn wɔ Ewuradze setsie nye kasakyerɛ mu."
hom mfa suro nye ahopopo nye akomakor ntsie hom honam afamu ewuranom asɛm
dɛ hɔn a wɔsɔ nyimpa enyi
column4: na mbom dɛ Kraest nkowaa a wofi akoma mu reyɛ Nyankopɔn ne pɛ;"

column2: "na wɔdze ɔpɛ pa rosom dɛ wɔdze rema Ewuradze na nnyɛ nyimpa a:"
"na hom nyim dɛ papa a obiara bɛyɛ no
column5: ɔnoara ho akatua na obenya no wɔ Ewuradze hɔ."

column4: hom nyɛ dɛmara mma hom nkowaa
column5: na hom ngyaa mpuwbɔ; na hom nyim dɛ hɔn wura nye hom wura wɔ sor

column3: hom nyɛ dzen wɔ Ewuradze nye no tum ahoɔdzen no mu."
ama hom eetum egyina abɔnsam ndaadaa no enyim."

column2: "Osiandɛ nnyɛ yɛnye honam nye bɔgya na enya ntokwadzi
column5: nye wiadze yi sum mu etumfo
column6: nye emumuyɛ esunsum a wɔwɔ sorsor no."

column3: hom mfa Nyankopɔn akodze no nyina mmia
column4: ama hom eetum egyina wɔ da bɔn no mu
column5: na hom ewie akodzi yi nyina no
column6: hom eetum egyina hom anan do."

column3: hom ngyina hɔ dɛ hom dze nokwar abɔ hom asen
column4: na hom ahyɛ tsenenee akatabo no
column6: "na hom dze asomdwee asɛmpa no ho ahosiesie ahyehyɛ hom anan;"

column3: hom nkitsa gyedzi kokyɛm no a hom dze botum edum ɔbɔn no n’egyen ndua a ogya wɔ ano no."
nye Sunsum afona a ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn asɛm no:"

column2: "na hom mfa mpaabɔ nye nkotoserɛ nyina nsɔr aber nyina wɔ Sunsum mu. Na hom iyi ara ntsi
column4: ntotɔ nserɛ mma ahotseweefo no nyina
column8: Nyankopɔn mma me ɔkasahom ma memfa ndam nka asɛmpa no nda no mu esumasɛm no edzi
column10: "ɔno ho ɔsomafo na meyɛ wɔ mpokyerɛ mu yi
column11: ama maakasa ndam do wɔ mu

column3: mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ ma hom ehu mo ho asɛm no
column4: onua dɔfo nye Ewuradze mu somfo nokwafo

column2: "ɔno na iyiara ntsi masoma no hom nkyɛn
column3: ma hom eehu mbrɛ hɛn asetsena mu tse
column4: na ɔaaka hom akoma ato hom yamu."

column3: nye gyedzi a ofir Egya Nyankopɔn nye Ewuradze Jesus Kraest no

column2: "Adom nka hɔn a wɔdze ɔdɔ a odzi mu dɔ Ewuradze Jesus Kraest no nyina."
